parameter.name: WebAPIContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: WebAPIContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(localdb)\MSSQLLocalDB; Initial Catalog=WebAPIContext-20150916222701; Integrated Security=True; MultipleActiveResultSets=True; AttachDbFilename=|DataDirectory|WebAPIContext-20150916222701.mdf
